para.text: pane at top left displays a list of the installed packages and to the right of this are a series of views onto the items owned by the currently selected package. The different types of item (

para.text: represents the collection of fundamental classes owned by the development system but it is not, however, a genuine package since it is not permissible to export it to a .PAC file.
